an5.238:4.1: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.238:4.3: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism, and they criticize those deserving of praise.
an5.238:4.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.238:5.1: A resident mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.238:5.3: After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism, and they praise those deserving of praise.
an5.238:5.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
